example_modid.tinyconfig.title: Aliven't Messenger Settings
example_modid.tinyconfig.intallMobMessag: Gives aliven't messages for all mobs, instead of just ones with custom names
example_modid.tinyconfig.villagerMessage: Gives aliven't messages for all Villagers and Zombie Villagers with trades
example_modid.tinyconfig.loreDrops.toolt: Gives lore info for items dropped from named mobs
example_modid.tinyconfig.nameColour.tool: The names of the mobs will appear with color
example_modid.tinyconfig.speciesName.too: The aliven't message for named mobs will display their "species" between parenthesis
example_modid.tinyconfig.aliventMessageS: Removes the near-retundant log message of aliven't villagers and custom-named mobs
